channel.title: How to get revenge
channel.description: Disclaimer im not respoiable for any thing happed to u and i suck at spelling If some1 piss teh fuk off u then u want revege right? this is my ideal list of revenge 1. Try to get urself popluar in school so u can make da strogest boy iun school to beat up ur vitcim 2. get a soda can shake it like hell when it started to fizz throw it hard at da vitcim da can will expole then u do da math 3.put a pile of shit on ur viticum "walk way" then they will step on it 4.get a "potao gun" then shhoot to bug the hell off ur vitcum 5. dance like ur on fire and yell loud around ur viticum they will get annoyed like hell 6.put a bucket load of ice in ur vitcuim clothes they will run around yelling 7. if they have a computer with intrent u get thier ip and email then bomb thier computer to make the computrer laggy 8.tell the girl/boy that ur vituim hate the most that the vitcuim love them and want to make out with the boy/girl then the boy/girl will stalk the vitcuim and that it for now i will have to think more

item.title: How to get revenge
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

therealjdb:

If you need revenge that bad just put some cinder blocks underneath their car/parents car and slit their tires and fill with quick dry cement and then remove the blocks. they will have some sweet gas mileage.

Or you could smash there window and throw a petrol bomb in it.

item.title: How to get revenge
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“MidGuardian, post:7, topic:63510”][quote author=therealjdb link=topic=91946.msg961257#msg961257 date=1172918486]
Even if I could understand your post I feel obliged to tell you that revenge will get you know where in life, you may think it will make you feel better but in reality it destroys you. People who hate you don’t win, when you hate them, they win and you destroy yourself.
[/quote]

^^^^^^^ Agreed DJB.[/quote]
Thank you, I realized i misspelled know in place of no :o

Read full topic
